revised_title: Trace Element Uptake and Metabolic Consequences in Plants
tldr: This article discusses the metabolic and physiological consequences of trace element deficiency in plants and animals. It explores the levels, distribution, and chemical forms of trace elements in food plants, as well as the processes of uptake, complex formation, and translocation of these elements. The article also highlights the importance of understanding trace element uptake mechanisms for maintaining plant health and growth.
